title: Agent Policy Protocol (APoP) v1.0 Manifest
description: Defines how AI agents may interact with a website â€” what they can access, what actions are allowed, rate limits, and verification requirements. Part of the Agent Policy Protocol (APoP) standard.

$schema.description: Reference to this JSON Schema for validation.

version.description: APoP protocol version. Use '1.0' for this specification.

policyUrl.description: Canonical URL where this policy is hosted (e.g., https://example.com/.well-known/agent-policy.json).

defaultPolicy.description: Site-wide fallback rules. Applies when no path-specific rule matches the request.

pathPolicies.description: Path-specific policy overrides. Evaluated in order; first matching path wins.

verification.description: Configuration for how agent identity verification is handled.

contact.description: Contact information for policy questions, abuse reports, or compliance queries.

ActionType.description: Standardized action type that an agent may perform.

RateLimit.description: Rate limiting configuration for agent requests.

requests.description: Maximum number of requests allowed within the specified window.

PolicyRule.description: A set of rules governing agent access.

oneOf.description: If true, access is allowed by default. If false, access is denied.
List of explicitly allowed action types.

disallow.description: List of explicitly disallowed action types. Takes precedence over 'allow' when both are present.

actions.description: Explicit list of permitted action types (alternative to boolean allow).

requireVerification.description: If true, agents must verify their identity before access is granted.

PathPolicy.description: Path-specific policy override. Extends PolicyRule with path matching and agent filtering.

path.description: URL path pattern. Supports glob-style wildcards: * matches a single path segment, ** matches multiple segments.

agentAllowlist.description: List of agent identifiers explicitly allowed on this path. If present, only listed agents may access. Accepts DID URIs, email-style identifiers, or agent name patterns.

agentDenylist.description: List of agent identifiers explicitly denied on this path. Agents on this list are blocked regardless of other rules.

oneOf.description: Multiple accepted verification methods (any one suffices).

method.description: Supported verification method(s). pkix = PKI signature validation, did = Decentralized Identifiers, verifiable-credential = W3C Verifiable Credentials (AP2 alignment), partner-token = pre-shared API token.

registry.description: URL of the verification registry for identity lookups.

trustedIssuers.description: List of trusted Verifiable Credential issuer DIDs. Only relevant when method includes 'verifiable-credential'.

verificationEndpoint.description: URL where agents can initiate verification (e.g., key exchange or token request).

Contact.description: Contact information for the policy owner.

email.description: Contact email for policy questions or compliance.

abuseUrl.description: URL for reporting agent abuse or policy violations.

description.description: Brief description of this policy's purpose.

owner.description: Organization or individual that owns this website/policy.

maintainer.description: Contact for the person or team maintaining the policy.

lastModified.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last policy update.

license.description: License URL or SPDX identifier for the policy content.

Interoperability.description: Cross-protocol interoperability declarations. Links this APoP policy to other agentic protocol endpoints.

a2aAgentCard.description: URL to the site's A2A Agent Card (if the site operates as an A2A agent). Typically /.well-known/agent.json.

mcpServerUrl.description: URL to the site's MCP server endpoint (if the site exposes MCP tools).

webmcpEnabled.description: Whether the site exposes WebMCP tools via navigator.modelContext.

ucpCapabilities.description: URL to the site's UCP capability profile (if the site supports Universal Commerce Protocol).

apaaiEndpoint.description: URL to the site's APAAI accountability endpoint for action logging and evidence.

metadata.description: Agent access policy for Example Corp
